extendedInfo.description: Search for books, DVDs, audiobooks, digital downloads and more. Place holds or renew items, check out our Facebook, blogs and tweets, or contact us right from the app. The GEPL staff is here for you!We've also included a great new way to search our books. No need to type full words or wait for results. Just type the first few letters of words and see the search in action while you type. For books on "Jacqueline Kennedy Onassis" just type "ja ke on".GEPL hopes you enjoy our new mobile app, and we want you to know we'll be growing our mobile services over time. Thank you for downloading!
